title: barkSpecIrregularity
description: The barkSpecIrregularity object computes the Bark spectrum irregularity of an audio signal, a descriptor indicating the noisiness or irregularity of its spectral envelope. It processes a specified window of an audio array, offering configurable parameters such as Bark filterbank spacing, windowing function, and a choice between Jensen or Krimphoff algorithms. For efficiency, it can also accept pre-computed spectral data via "chain" messages.
